techmeme.title: Reddit adds new tools, including Post Insights and Rules Check, which lets users see if what they are posting potentially goes against a subreddit's rules (Mariella Moon/Engadget)
Sources: there haven't been negotiations between ByteDance and prospective TikTok US buyers, amid confusion over who's leading Trump administration negotiations (Dan Primack/Axios)
Nansen: Trump's World Liberty Financial bought Ether worth $10M, WBTC worth $10M, and MOVE worth $1.5M ahead of the White House Crypto Summit (Brian McGleenon/The Block)
1Password adds a feature to help find a login, password, or access code by adding a specific physical location to items in a new Nearby section of the app (Andrew Liszewski/The Verge)
Turing, which works with engineers to contribute code to AI projects, raised a $111M Series E led by Malaysia's sovereign wealth fund at a $2.2B valuation (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
